msbt.message: You know, I don't think I've ever met But hey, I don't judge. Whether they enjoy gourmet or basic , I'll be kind.
Know what has been up to lately?
Hey, have you heard the wild tales about what has been getting up to lately?
, I haven't seen in foreverI'm sure everything's OK and that there was just a really good movie marathon on TV or something
Guess who I saw today.<10_4 /> !It felt like two celebrities meeting up and fangeeking out over each other, .
Oh, guess who I saw yesterday, just walking around<10_4 /> It was ! I had to stop myself from running up and asking for an autograph.

Hey, do you know what's up with lately?I get such fear of missing out when one of my friends isn't around.It's likewhat are they doing without me? What could be so exclusive that I wouldn't be invited?!
Oh, by the way, did you know that has been visiting from ?
Did you know that from recently graced us with their presence?
This is old news now, but I heard that from the land of paid us a visit. Fingers crossed we get another visit soon, !
Did you know that came from the remote island of just to see us? I mean, I'd travel that far for some good , so I guess I can't say anything. Ha HA!
You know who I've been thinking about lately? !You know, from ? I wonder what they've been up to lately
Oh, by the way, do you know ? From a place called , I think. I've always wanted to visit . Heard the local is to die for.
You knowI haven't seen that around here lately, Maybe I should up my island-hopping game Become more of a wandering dance guru or something
I heard that they've been having a ball on , just partying non-stop. To that I sayenchant√©! It's Portuguese foryou're welcome.
Word is that they caught a ton of local fish, .I'm sure they lured 'em right out of the water with that classic charm. Ha HA!

From what I hear, they are quite the local bug catcher.I wonder if they donated any of them to the "museum"Oh, sorry. That's just the fancy name I came up with for the bug jail that Blathers is running.
The rumor is they were practically scouring the beaches for shells.I wonder if they found the secret message I spelled out with pebbles It read, "!" Ha HA!
I heard that they were really clamming it up. You knowthey caught a ton of clams. Might even have to say they were clamoring for the stuff.Ha HA!<10_4 /> Waitmaybe stand-up comedy is my true calling
I heard that they shot down a whole bunch of those balloons that float by sometimes. I hope they can keep that slingshot holstered when I release promotional balloons featuring my new headshot.
I have it on good authority that they wished upon a number of shooting stars. If I had a wish, I'd wish for more wishes, of course.But if I had TWO wishes, I'd wish for their wishes to come true.
I heard that they gave a lot of the trees around here a good shaking, . Can't say I blame 'em. It's worth the occasional wasp sting to score an exclusive piece of furniture. Ha HA!
Rumor has it they were hitting the trees hard yesterday. Like, with an axe! I'm a bit handy with an axe myself, you know. Well, I was more into hot yoga, but the skills transfer.

I guess they were the one who cut down all of those trees.I can't complain about the new sight lines, but I hope someone plants a few new ones eventually. Trees look great in the background when you're doing outdoor selfies. Ha HA!
I noticed that they did a bunch of gardening recently.That's free exterior decor for , baby.
Word on the street is that they watered a bunch of our local flowers.The whole world's a stage‚Äîmight as well help keep it beautiful. Ha HA!
I heard that they were really putting on a show for everyone with tons of Reactions. I wish I had been around for that. Nothing like a live improv session with an unsuspecting audience.
Rumor has it they've been super busy doing DIY stuff.Do you think they made something for me? I have no reason to think they did, butWHAT IF?

Get this. I heard that they broke a whole bunch of their tools. I think that just shows commitment.It's like my acting coach always says, "If you're not breaking something, you're not committed to the part"!
I heard they spent most of their time hiding away indoors.I get it. Being out in nature is nice but so is watching two-second videos loop endlessly from a couch.
Rumor is that they really took advantage of the weather and spent most of their time outside. That's the best way to de-stress, you know. Take a walk, smell the flowers, do some a capella busking
I heard they spent most of their time just digging holes all over the place.Were they burying pitfall seeds or treasures? There's only one way to find outdig up the whole island!
I've noticed that they kept falling into those pitfall holes all over the place. Who thought it was a good idea to put those everywhere? What if I fell in one and missed an audition?
I heard there was a lot of noise coming from their house recently<10_4 /> Maybe they were redecorating!Why would they do that without consulting me first?!
I saw them working on some custom designs on their phone.I wonder if they'll design any looks for FashionBlast That's the name of my fashion show, obv.

We actually had a pretty good conversation, you know.I'd tell you what we talked about, but we discussed some of my intellectual property, so I'm gonna need you to sign a non-disclosure.<10_4 /> Ha HA!<10_4 /> But really, let me know if you want to sign it.
Word is that they spent most of their time schmoozing with . Hey, I'm not jealous. It's called networking, !
My sources tell me that they were a total social butterfly.So what does that make me? "Chatty " just doesn't have the same ring.

I heard that the wasps got 'em pretty good.The last time I got stung by wasps I got a few headshots taken so I could try to get cast in a zombie movie. Hey, you know what they say. When life gives you wasps, you use 'em to create some buzz. Ha HA!

When I heard that they got stung by some wasps, I knew just what to do.I performed a few minutes of my comedy set for them right away! Yeah, laughter is the best medicine. They were laughing so hard they were crying. Well, I think there was some laughing mixed with the crying.
Rumor is that they found a whole bunch of fossils buried around here.Fossils are cool because they're, like, retro bones. And retro just means "old stuff that's lamein a cool way."
I guess they spent a lot of time going around hitting all the rocks around here. Do you think that makes thema rock star?<10_4 /> Oh! Oh, I need to write that down,
The rumor is that they buried some Bells somewhere around here.Now, I'm not normally a digging , but it seems I might have to make an exception
The rumor is they spent a ton of time collecting .Probably working on some new recipe or something, Trust me, you haven't lived until you've tried made with .
From what I hear, they spent a lot of time staring at their phone.Yeah, yeah ME complaining about someone being on their phone. It's tr√®s ironic. That's French for totally wack!

There's a rumor they spent most of their time walking around looking at their phone. How could you do that? Just stare at your phone in a paradise like this, ? I just read an article about how bad that is. Let me look it up on my phone and show you<10_4 /> Oh.
I have reason to believe that they've been hard at work building roads.That's literally helping put on the map!<10_4 /> Assuming we're talking road maps.
The gossip is that they volunteered some of their time to work on river management. , if I were a fish, I'd be pretty hyped right now. Then I'd remember that I eat worms
According to my sources, they did some great work on the cliffs all over the island. Talk about dedication! Literally terraforming the place, .
I heard that they put up some new fences and took down some old ones, or something. I couldn't tell you much more, because I'm free-range, baby! No fence can hold me back.

Word is that they spent a lot of time arranging furniture outside.Could have saved a lot of time if they'd just come and asked me for my expert opinion. Bah, who am I kidding. It would have taken three times as long. Ha HA!

Last I heard they were collecting miles left and right, .My problem is I can never save mine up long enough to get something really good. I'm like the kid at the carnival who gets 50 plastic whistles instead of the giant stuffed panda
I have reason to believe they recently paid off a loan.Color me impressed. I have a hard time finishing most of the things I‚Å†‚ÄîHey! What's that over there?
Rumor has it they made quite a few visits to Nook's Cranny.Well, I hope they found a piece of furniture they liked.Browsing is fun and all, but the whole point of shopping is to buy stuff, !
What I heard is they created a new island tune, . It's reallythem, you know? They do say music is a mirror into the soulThat means if I wrote a song it would clearly be an international sensation, !
I hear they revamped the design of the flag at Resident Services.Sounds like a smart move to me. No one wants their island to be known for its pass√© flag design.
My sources tell me they put on something of a fashion show with that wand of theirs. Of course fashion should be fun, but makes fun look GOOD, !

I got wind of the fact that they are an expert at crossing water with a vaulting pole, . I wonder what it would take to get me to pole vault across a body of water Probably the chance to land into a crowd of my adoring fans.
There's a rumor that they bought a whole lot of turnips from Daisy Mae.I like to buy turnips for the chance to get rich quick.The best form of success is the kind that falls right into your lap, !
I heard they made a pretty penny selling their turnips.And it takes more than a little luck to do that, you know. It takes a whole LOTTA luck, !
Word on the street is they always have important thoughts to share with their friends, . "Important Thoughts." Huh. I think I just found the perfect title for my much-anticipated memoir.
According to my sources, they are on some kind of weed-pulling mission.I get it. I'm partial to a minimalist aesthetic myself, .
Rumor has it they switched up their hairstyle, .I wonder what their motivation was Changing one's hairstyle is not a decision one makes lightly.
I heard they recently updated their look.Say, If you could change one thing about my face, what would it be? You got nothing, huh? No, you're right. My face is pretty perfect as is.
I hear they're always snapping away, taking photos of , . Uh-oh! I hope they give me a chance to approve any pictures of me before they share their albums!
